name: about:newtab (FF Logo)
description:
Simple about:newtab background. meant for FF 12 and up.
Uses the default background color and adds a FF logo in the middle.

Please note: the screen shot was edited and reduced for upload due to the 100kb limit. 
Please use the preview function before install.
additional_info:
update 12/19/2015 - rehosted image
update 11/15/17 - fixed background color to stop giving errors

NOTE: this theme only works in stylish 2.1.1 & stylus
